caelum::CaelumListener

caelum::CaelumListener Class Reference

Detailed Description

The Caelum listener interface. Allows to register its subclasses to Caelum so that it receives notifications each frame before it's started or finished. Useful, for instance, to prototype certain functionality like passing the sun direction to a shader/material that isn't defined inside Caelum itself.
Author:
Jes√∫s Alonso Abad
Version:
1.0

CaelumSystem *  caelumSystem
)  [inline, virtual]
 

Trigger fired just after Caelum is about to do its work.

Parameters:
e The Ogre FrameEvent object, in case it's desired to use this as a FrameListener as well.
caelumSystem A reference to the invoker (the Caelum system) itself in case some operations on it are wanted to be done.
Returns:
True if it's desired to continue running after Caelum finished.
